description: Managing conversation history, context, and state with LollmsDiscussion.

# LoLLMs Chat (Discussion Management)

Use `LollmsDiscussion` to manage conversation history, context, and state.

```python
from lollms_client import LollmsClient, LollmsDiscussion

lc = LollmsClient()
discussion = LollmsDiscussion(lc)

discussion.add_message(role="user", content="Hello AI!")
response = discussion.generate_response()
print(response)
```
